about_the_game:
Step into intense first-person combat in this skills-based melee arena fighter. Engage in fast-paced PvP duels that blend expressive movement, strategic resource management, and visceral, anime-style action.

Master the Art of Combat

  • Block and Counter: Defend against attacks and punish reckless opponents.
  • Break Defenses: Use grabs to overcome shields and create openings.
  • Expressive Movement: Outmaneuver your opponents and maintain control.
  • Manage Your Mana: Build your mana bar to unleash powerful special moves, escape combos, and reduce recovery times.

Combo Based First Person Action

Chain creative attack combinations while using fluid movement to chase your opponent and maintain pressure.

Connect and Compete Online

Experience online play designed for competitive battles and social fun:

  • Rollback Netcode: Ensures smooth and consistent gameplay.
  • Play With Friends: Challenge your friends or find new rivals in online matchmaking.
  • Spectator Features: Watch live battles, cheer for players, and study strategies between matches.
